feed.title: KrakenD Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for KrakenD: v2.7.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Updated the JOSE library to unflag the vulnerability CVE-2024-28180 from scanner, even it does not affect KrakenD.
  • The gocloud library has been updated to a higher version (includes minor security fixes for PubSub, Secrets, Azure and AWS
  • OpenTelemetry libraries updated
  • Go language updated
  • The check plugin command printed unnecessarily the help command
  • Prevent a failing Identity Provider to be queried constantly by introducing the property failed_jwk_key_cooldown
  • OpenAPI was generating incorrect URL patterns with placeholders by decoding its special chars
  • OpenAPI did not accept keys with dots in the schemas
  • OpenAPI did not have dynamic routing into account and required to manually declare input_headers and input_query_strings, which are now automatic
  • Tiered rate limit durations were incorrectly parsed
  • Inheritance in the extended flexible configuration didn't allow special chars
  • Make the KrakenD main module version detectable by Syft by @LaurentGoderre in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/912

New Contributors

  • @LaurentGoderre made their first contribution in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/912

Full Changelog: https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/compare/v2.7.0...v2.7.1

entry.title: New release for KrakenD: v2.7.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • lua pkg upgraded to v2.1.3 by @kpacha in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/926

Full Changelog: https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/compare/v2.7.1...v2.7.2

entry.title: New release for KrakenD: v2.8.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Otel add backend and endpoint static attrs by @dhontecillas in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/938
  • upgrade to latest krakend-lua version by @kpacha in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/937
  • remove setting go version variable at link time by @dhontecillas in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/929
  • Bump version to 2.8.0 by @taik0 in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/943

Full Changelog: https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/compare/v2.7.2...v2.8.0

entry.title: New release for KrakenD: v2.9.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix race warnings by @thedae in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/947
  • Fix build by @thedae in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/956
  • Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.32.0 to 0.33.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/958
  • New methods to lint the config file by @thedae in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/954
  • Bump krakend-lua to v2.6.1 by @thedae
  • Integration of global param propagation for sequential merger by @thedae in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/960
  • Bump v2.9.0 by @kpacha in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/963
  • Update Go to 1.22.11 and Alpine to 3.21

New Contributors

  • @thedae made their first contribution in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/947

Full Changelog: https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/compare/v2.8.0...v2.9.0

entry.title: New release for KrakenD: v2.9.1

What's Changed

Full Changelog: https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/compare/v2.9.0...v2.9.1
